mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.info_id, t.f_person, t.f_time, d.info_title, d.title_img, d.info_type, s.rec_lname, s.menu_name, u.nick_name as user_name from d_info_favorite t left join d_info d on t.info_id=d.rec_id left join s_info_menu s on d.info_menuid=s.rec_id left join sys_user u on t.f_person=u.user_name
